casebody.data:
Joseph STEPHENSON
v.
COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided October 17, 2018

Joseph Stephenson, self-represented, in support of the petition.

Linda F. Currie-Zeffiro, assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The petitioner Joseph Stephenson's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court (AC 38885) is denied.
